summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Trading Dashboard MVP. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend loads correctly with full navigation, market data, and user authentication. All core features working as expected.

ui_bugs.issue: Desktop navigation links are positioned outside viewport causing click timeout issues
ui_bugs.selector: nav a elements in desktop view
ui_bugs.workaround: Mobile navigation via hamburger menu works perfectly

passed_tests: Market Prices API - All 4 symbols (XAUUSD, NAS100, SP500, DOW) with live data
Philosophy Quote API - Italian quotes displaying correctly
Psychology Check-in - Form submission and stats working
Journal Entry Creation - AI suggestions generation working
Strategy Creation & AI Optimization - GPT-5.2 integration functional
AI Chat - All 8 AI contexts responding correctly
Monte Carlo Simulation - Mathematical calculations working
Community Posts & Likes - Social features functional
Discipline Rules CRUD - Complete lifecycle working
Ascension/Gamification - XP and level system working
Settings Updates - Theme and language switching working
Mobile Navigation - Complete sidebar menu with all 11 sections
Authentication Flow - JWT token management working
Market Data Display - Real-time price updates with trends
Italian Localization - Proper Italian text throughout interface
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix desktop navigation positioning issue - navigation links are outside viewport in desktop mode. Consider adjusting CSS positioning or z-index for proper clickability.
